reports.title: About this dashboard
reports.query:
This is an example dashboard on financial crime data. It uses the `fincen` dataset from 
[https://demo.neo4jlabs.com/](https://demo.neo4jlabs.com/).

This dashboard's purpose is to provide examples on how to use and customize all the different NeoDash report types.

It consists of three pages:
- **Countries**: high-level data on specific countries.
- **Investigate Entity**: a way to drill down into a specific entity.
- **Statistics**: high-level statistics about the data.

Try out the Documentation ðŸ“„ button on the left for basic examples of the different visualization reports.

reports.title: How much does each entity benefit in total? (Hint: try clicking the table headers to sort/filter data)
reports.query:
MATCH Path=(e:Entity)-[:COUNTRY]->(c:Country), (f:Filing)-[:BENEFITS]->(e)
RETURN Path, e.name as Entity, c.name as Country, suM(f.amount) as `Total Benefit ($)`
LIMIT 1000

reports.title: Where in Europe does the Netherlands send money to?
reports.query:
MATCH (c1:Country)--(:Entity)<-[:ORIGINATOR]-(f:Filing)-[:BENEFITS]->(:Entity)--(c2:Country)
WHERE c1.name =  "Netherlands"
AND distance(c2.location, point({latitude: 53, longitude: 9})) < 3000000
WITH c1, c2, sum(f.amount) as amount ORDER BY amount DESC
RETURN c1, c2, apoc.create.vRelationship(c1, "TRANSFER", {amount: amount}, c2)

reports.title: Which entities are involved?
reports.query:
MATCH (c1:Country)--(:Entity)<-[:ORIGINATOR]-(f:Filing)-[:BENEFITS]->(:Entity)--(c2:Country)
WHERE c1.name =  "Netherlands"
AND distance(c2.location, point({latitude: 53, longitude: 9})) < 3000000
WITH c1, c2, sum(f.amount) as amount
WITH c1, c2, apoc.create.vRelationship(c1, "TRANSFER", {amount: amount}, c2) as t

MATCH path=(c2:Country)-[r]-(e:Entity)
RETURN c1, t, c2, collect(path)[0..10]

reports.title: Entity Investigator ðŸ”Ž
reports.query:
You can use this page to explore information about a single entity in the dataset. All reports are automatically updated based on the selected entity.

**Hint**: Try typing **ING Bank NV** 
in the "Entity name" box to the right of this text.

reports.title: Select an entity to view reports
reports.query:
MATCH (n:`Entity`) 
WHERE toLower(toString(n.`name`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) 
RETURN DISTINCT n.`name` as value LIMIT 5

reports.title: Details
reports.query:
MATCH (e:Entity)
WHERE e.name = $neodash_entity_name
WITH e LIMIT 1
MATCH (c:Country)--(e)--(f:Filing)
WITH ["Entity full name: " + e.name, 
      "Country of origin: "+c.name,  
      "Total filings: $"+ toInteger(sum(f.amount)/1000000) + " million",
      "Start of operations: "+ toString(date((min(f.begin))))
] as data
UNWIND data as Information
RETURN Information

reports.title: Entity interactions
reports.query:
MATCH path=(e:Entity)<--()-->(e2:Entity)
WHERE e.name = $neodash_entity_name
WITH DISTINCT e, e2
RETURN e, e2, apoc.create.vRelationship(e, "INTERACTS", {}, e2)

reports.title: Who receives most money from this entity?
reports.query:
MATCH path=(e:Entity)<--(f:Filing)-->(e2:Entity)
WHERE e.name = $neodash_entity_name
WITH DISTINCT e, f, e2
RETURN e2.name as `Other`, sum(f.amount) as Amount
ORDER BY Amount ASC

reports.title: Details on a filing by the entity
reports.query:
MATCH path=(e:Entity)<--(f:Filing)
WHERE e.name = $neodash_entity_name
RETURN f LIMIT 1

reports.title: Number of nodes by label
reports.query:
MATCH (n)
RETURN labels(n), count(*) as count
ORDER BY count ASC

reports.title: Number of relationship types
reports.query:
MATCH (n)-[e]->(m)
RETURN type(e),count(*) as count
ORDER BY count ASC

reports.title: Number of filing per year
reports.query:
MATCH (f:Filing)
WHERE f.begin IS NOT NULL
WITH f, date(f.begin).year as Year
RETURN Year, COUNT(f) as Total
ORDER BY Year ASC

reports.title: Example: using iFrames to embed custom visualizations (3D graph)
